name: ryot
description: Ryot is a self-hosted media tracking application for movies and shows, integrating with TMDB and Trakt. It includes playlists, search, and a smart dashboard UI.
features: Media tracking: Track movies, TV shows, books, and games you've watched, read, or played.
TMDB integration: Fetch metadata, posters, and details from The Movie Database.
Trakt sync: Synchronize your watch history and ratings with Trakt.tv.
Custom lists: Create playlists and collections to organize your media.
Progress tracking: Mark episodes as watched and track completion status for series.
Rating system: Rate content and view your personal rating history.
Search functionality: Find media across multiple databases from one interface.
Dashboard overview: See your recent activity and statistics at a glance.
Recommendations: Get suggestions based on your viewing history and preferences.
Calendar view: Track upcoming releases for shows and movies you follow.
Import/export: Migrate data from other tracking services or back up your library.
Multi-user support: Create separate accounts for family members with individual tracking.
